org.eclipse.keyple.plugin.android.nfc

Interface AndroidNfcReader


  • public AndroidNfcReader

    Reader to communicate with NFC Tag though Android NfcAdapter

    Configure NFCAdapter Protocols with AbstractAndroidNfcReader.setParameter

    See Also:
    NfcAdapter, AbstractAndroidNfcReader.setParameter

    • Field Detail

      • Companion

        static org.eclipse.keyple.plugin.android.nfc.AndroidNfcReader.Companion Companion

    • Method Detail

      • printTagId

        @NotNull
java.lang.String printTagId()

        Gets a string describing the low level description of the current tag.

        Used for logging purpose

        Returns:
        string

      • processIntent

        void processIntent(@NotNull
                   android.content.Intent intent)

        Process data from NFC Intent. Can be use to handle NFC Tag received when app is started by nfc detection

        Parameters:
        intent - : Intent received and filterByProtocol by xml tech_list

      • getPresenceCheckDelay

        @Nullable
java.lang.Integer getPresenceCheckDelay()

        Allows the calling application to specify the delay that the platform will use for performing presence checks on any discovered tag. see @NfcAdapter.EXTRA_READER_PRESENCE_CHECK_DELAY

      • setPresenceCheckDelay

        void setPresenceCheckDelay(@Nullable
                           java.lang.Integer p)

        Allows the calling application to specify the delay that the platform will use for performing presence checks on any discovered tag. see @NfcAdapter.EXTRA_READER_PRESENCE_CHECK_DELAY

      • getNoPlateformSound

        @Nullable
java.lang.Boolean getNoPlateformSound()

        Allows the invoker to prevent the platform from playing sounds when it discovers a tag.

      • setNoPlateformSound

        void setNoPlateformSound(@Nullable
                         java.lang.Boolean p)

        Allows the invoker to prevent the platform from playing sounds when it discovers a tag.

      • getSkipNdefCheck

        @Nullable
java.lang.Boolean getSkipNdefCheck()

        Prevent the platform from performing any NDEF checks in reader mode.

      • setSkipNdefCheck

        void setSkipNdefCheck(@Nullable
                      java.lang.Boolean p)

        Prevent the platform from performing any NDEF checks in reader mode.
